result.arabic_text: وَمَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِي يَنۡعِقُ بِمَا لَا يَسۡمَعُ إِلَّا دُعَآءٗ وَنِدَآءٗۚ صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
result.translation: 171. Koroositeh yan marih ceelalloo kee iimaan kee tirtoh ken Seeca numih ceelallo lacay Qiytoo kee Seecok-sa wohuk tu-Aaxige waat Qiy iyya numih ceelallo, tama koros usun Ayti-maleelay cakkik sinni Aytiita Alifte, duuduttey cakkit yabtaamak Arraba sinnik tibbixe, inti-maleelay Baxxaqqa itta Astooti Able waytah inna, usun wohul kas-kassoowa mara hinnon.
